Structure-Enhanced Search

Structure-enhanced agentic RAG systems enhance retrieval-augmented generation by enabling a single agent to reason over symbolic knowledge sources such as knowledge graphs through dynamic querying, tool invocation, and reflective self-monitoring.

Analysis & Explanation

Choosing a Search Strategy

Selection Guide
  • In-Context: Quick deployment, no training, works with any LLM
  • Post-Training: Better performance, learned retrieval timing
  • Structure-Enhanced: When you have knowledge graphs or structured data
